javax.microedition.lcdui

Class Font

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.microedition.lcdui.Font

  • public final class Font
extends java.lang.Object
    The Font class provides methods to create and manipulate font styles and sizes. It allows setting different font faces, styles, and sizes, and provides methods to measure text dimensions.
